mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is grammatically correct from the options provided: Walking down the street, the trees seemed to sway in the wind.

options.a: Walking down the street, the trees seemed to sway in the wind.
options.b: Walking down the street, I noticed the trees swaying in the wind.
options.c: Walking down the street, the wind caused the trees to sway
options.d: Walking down the street, the swaying trees were noticed.
